description: male white face with red lips, black teeth and black hair (no part); has light blue cloth storage bag; black cord at back
text: This No_ mask represents the Taira clansman Atsumori (1169-84) who died in battle at the age of sixteen on the beach at Suma. The full face and lips and gentle, hopeful eyes convey the spirit of the handsome youngster--without hinting at the tragedy that eventually befell him.
title: Ju_roku (Sixteen)
